alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 17 at 2:49PM MDT until April 19 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches above 9,000 feet. 4 to 6 inches expected at Union Pass, and 1 to 3 inches at South Pass. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West and Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 1 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, including in the backcountry.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
